Summary: Biochemical reaction from S-EDDP to EMDP.
Biochemical reaction from methadone to p-hydroxymethadone.
Biochemical reaction from methadone to methadone M4.
Biochemical reaction from methadone M4 to methadone M5.
Biochemical reaction from methadone to methadone M3.
Biochemical reaction from (S)-methadone to S-EDDP. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C19, CYP3A4, CYP2B6 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from R-EDDP to EMDP.
Biochemical reaction from (R)-methadone to R-EDDP. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP2C19, CYP2B6 or CYP2D6.
Transport from methadone to methadone. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
